title: ‘Like being tortured’: Texas residents living next to bitcoin mine are getting sick and being ignored
description: Republican Governor Greg Abbott said Texas “wears the crown as the bitcoin mining capital of the world.” But in small towns like Granbury, working-class residents living next to giant data centers are the ones paying the price for Texas’s crypto boom.

title: Trump crypto advisor David Bailey launching $300 million bitcoin investment company
description: David Bailey, CEO of BTC Inc. and a Trump crypto advisor, has raised $300 million to launch a publicly traded bitcoin investment company.
